name: 尤利西斯·格兰特
bio: 内战中联邦军总司令，美国第18任总统。以坚韧不拔的作战风格著称，攻克维克斯堡、接受李将军投降。担任总统期间推动重建南方和保护黑人权利。
bio_en: Eighteenth President and commanding general who led the Union Army to victory in the Civil War. His relentless campaigns at Vicksburg and through Virginia broke the Confederacy. As President, he fought to protect the rights of freed slaves during Reconstruction, though his administration was plagued by corruption scandals.

personalEvents.title: 攻克亨利堡与多纳尔逊堡
personalEvents.title_en: Captured Fort Henry and Fort Donelson
personalEvents.description: 取得西线首批重大胜利
personalEvents.description_en: Achieved the first major victories on the Western front

personalEvents.title: 维克斯堡战役
personalEvents.description: 围困维克斯堡，切断南方补给线
personalEvents.description_en: Besieged Vicksburg, severing Confederate supply lines

personalEvents.title: 接受李将军投降
personalEvents.description: 在阿波马托克斯接受李投降，内战结束
personalEvents.description_en: Accepted Lee's surrender at Appomattox Court House, ending the Civil War
